## PlayerMediaSourceDesc.mimeType property

The MIME type of the media source (e.g. `"video/mp4"`<!-- -->, `"application/x-mpegURL"`<!-- -->). Necessary if the type cannot be detected from file extension of the source URL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mimeType?: string;
```
